outputs.output_descr: The project will create entry points to engage with the Sri Lanka Police Service and the Ministry of Justice to develop mechanisms to deal with crime against women and children and resolve land disputes in the North and the East respectively. In addition, the project will inform UNDP programing and create institutional engagement with religious leaders and Northern Provincial Council

project_descr: The Resident Coordinator's office will initiate key interventions to reconciliation.
project_title: Catalytical support to reconciliation in SL
